purpose: Confirms that every manifest, workflow, API, and UI subsystem is active, healthy, and synchronized after deployment.

checks: All manifests exist and parse as valid JSON.
Each manifest has matching version fields.
Each manifest's 'lastUpdated' or 'lastExecuted' < 24h.
Each workflow YAML passes lint (`act validate`).
All scheduled jobs show last success < 24h in GitHub Actions UI.
Slack notifications received for last run.
Production domains resolve: dealershipai.com and dash.dealershipai.com.
Environment variables populated in Vercel dashboard.
Cron jobs (/api/schedule-quarterly, /api/nightly-lighthouse) visible and active.
Vercel Analytics reports p95 latency < 120ms.
Clerk middleware responding on dash.dealershipai.com.
First-time login redirects to /onboarding.
Returning user routes directly to /dashboard.
Roles and metadata (dealerId, brand, region) populated in session.
All steps render correctly (Scan, Input, Summary).
KPI data fetched from /api/marketpulse/compute.
PVR values saved to Clerk metadata.
Completion routes to /preview/orchestrator.
Pulse cards fetch live data from /api/pulse/snapshot.
Agent inbox tiles appear above baseline tiles.
Real-time updates via SSE or WebSocket.
Analytics graphs update correctly.
/api/ai-scores, /api/pulse-stream respond from edge runtime (200).
Average latency <150ms in Vercel logs.
Nightly tone training ran successfully.
Benchmark refresh executed Monday 04:00 UTC.
Mood analytics generated /data/mood-report.json.
Slack summary message posted to #deployments.
Knowledge graph updates hourly and answers queries <50ms.
Executive GPT report generated today in /reports/daily-summary.pdf.
Contextual feeds (weather, OEM, events) returning fresh data (<2h old).
Executive console dashboard accessible and rendering metrics.
All API routes use HTTPS.
No PII stored beyond hashed dealerId.
Audio muted by default and requires explicit un-mute.
Accessibility tests (axe-core) show 0 critical violations.
